QW_ACT_R1.name: HTML page has non-empty title
QW_ACT_R1.description: This rule checks that a non-embedded HTML page has a non-empty title.

QW_ACT_R2.name: HTML page has lang attribute
QW_ACT_R2.description: This rule checks that an HTML page has a non-empty lang attribute.

QW_ACT_R3.name: HTML page lang and xml:lang attributes have matching values
QW_ACT_R3.description: This rule checks that both lang and xml:lang attributes on the root element of a non-embedded HTML page, have the same primary language subtag.

QW_ACT_R4.name: Meta element has no refresh delay
QW_ACT_R4.description: This rule checks that the meta element is not used for delayed redirecting or refreshing.

QW_ACT_R5.name: HTML page lang attribute has valid language tag
QW_ACT_R5.description: This rule checks that the lang attribute of the root element of a non-embedded HTML page has a language tag with a known primary language subtag.

QW_ACT_R6.name: Image button has non-empty accessible name
QW_ACT_R6.description: This rule checks that each image button element has a non-empty accessible name.

QW_ACT_R7.name: Orientation of the page is not restricted using CSS transform property
QW_ACT_R7.description: This rule checks that page content is not restricted to either landscape or portrait orientation using CSS transform property.

QW_ACT_R9.name: Links with identical accessible names have equivalent purpose
QW_ACT_R9.description: This rule checks that links with identical accessible names resolve to the same resource or equivalent resources.

QW_ACT_R10.name: Iframe elements with identical accessible names have equivalent purpose
QW_ACT_R10.description: This rule checks that iframe elements with identical accessible names embed the same resource or equivalent resources.

QW_ACT_R11.name: Button has non-empty accessible name
QW_ACT_R11.description: This rule checks that each button element has a non-empty accessible name.

QW_ACT_R12.name: Link has non-empty accessible name
QW_ACT_R12.description: This rule checks that each link has a non-empty accessible name.

QW_ACT_R13.name: Element with aria-hidden has no content in sequential focus navigation
QW_ACT_R13.description: This rule checks that elements with an aria-hidden attribute do not contain elements that are part of the sequential focus navigation and focusable.

QW_ACT_R14.name: Meta viewport allows for zoom
QW_ACT_R14.description: This rule checks that the meta element retains the user agent ability to zoom.

QW_ACT_R15.name: Audio or video element avoids automatically playing audio
QW_ACT_R15.description: This rule checks that audio or video that plays automatically does not have audio that lasts for more than 3 seconds or has an audio control mechanism to stop or mute it.

QW_ACT_R16.name: Form field has non-empty accessible name
QW_ACT_R16.description: This rule checks that each form field element has a non-empty accessible name.

QW_ACT_R17.name: Image has non-empty accessible name
QW_ACT_R17.description: This rule checks that each image either has a non-empty accessible name or is marked up as decorative.

QW_ACT_R18.name: id attribute value is unique
QW_ACT_R18.description: This rule checks that all id attribute values on a single page are unique.

QW_ACT_R19.name: Iframe element has non-empty accessible name
QW_ACT_R19.description: This rule checks that each iframe element has a non-empty accessible name.

QW_ACT_R20.name: Role attribute has valid value
QW_ACT_R20.description: This rule checks that each role attribute has a valid value.

QW_ACT_R21.name: SVG element with explicit role has non-empty accessible name
QW_ACT_R21.description: This rule checks that each SVG image element that is explicitly included in the accessibility tree has a non-empty accessible name.

QW_ACT_R22.name: Element with lang attribute has valid language tag
QW_ACT_R22.description: This rule checks that a non-empty lang attribute of an element in the page has a language tag with a known primary language subtag.

QW_ACT_R23.name: Video element visual content has accessible alternative
QW_ACT_R23.description: This rule checks that video elements with audio have an alternative for the video content as audio or as text.

QW_ACT_R24.name: autocomplete attribute has valid value
QW_ACT_R24.description: This rule checks that the HTML autocomplete attribute has a correct value.

QW_ACT_R25.name: ARIA state or property is permitted
QW_ACT_R25.description: This rule checks that WAI-ARIA states or properties are allowed for the element they are specified on.

QW_ACT_R26.name: Video element auditory content has accessible alternative
QW_ACT_R26.description: This rule checks that video elements have an alternative for information conveyed through audio.

QW_ACT_R27.name: ARIA attribute is defined in WAI-ARIA
QW_ACT_R27.description: This rule checks that each aria- attribute specified is defined in ARIA 1.2.

QW_ACT_R28.name: Element with role attribute has required states and properties
QW_ACT_R28.description: This rule checks that elements that have an explicit role also specify all required states and properties.

QW_ACT_R29.name: Audio element content has text alternative
QW_ACT_R29.description: This rule checks that audio elements have a text alternative available.

QW_ACT_R30.name: Visible label is part of accessible name
QW_ACT_R30.description: This rule checks that interactive elements labeled through content have their visible label as part of their accessible name.

QW_ACT_R31.name: Video element visual-only content has accessible alternative
QW_ACT_R31.description: This rule checks that video elements without audio have an alternative available.

QW_ACT_R32.name: Video element visual content has strict accessible alternative
QW_ACT_R32.description: This rule checks that video elements with audio have audio description.

QW_ACT_R33.name: ARIA required context role
QW_ACT_R33.description: This rule checks that an element with an explicit semantic role exists inside its required context.

QW_ACT_R34.name: ARIA state or property has valid value
QW_ACT_R34.description: This rule checks that each ARIA state or property has a valid value type.

QW_ACT_R35.name: Heading has non-empty accessible name
QW_ACT_R35.description: This rule checks that each heading has a non-empty accessible name.

QW_ACT_R36.name: headers attribute specified on a cell refers to cells in the same table element
QW_ACT_R36.description: This rule checks that the headers attribute on a cell refer to other cells in the same table element.

QW_ACT_R37.name: Text has minimum contrast
QW_ACT_R37.description: This rule checks that the highest possible contrast of every text character with its background meets the minimal contrast requirement.

QW_ACT_R38.name: ARIA required owned elements
QW_ACT_R38.description: This rule checks that an element with an explicit semantic role has at least one of its required owned elements.

QW_ACT_R39.name: Table header cell has assigned cells
QW_ACT_R39.description: This rule checks that each table header has assigned cells in a table element.

QW_ACT_R40.name: Zoomed text node is not clipped with CSS overflow
QW_ACT_R40.description: This rule checks that text nodes are not unintentionally clipped by overflow, when a page is zoomed to 200% on 1280 by 1024 viewport.

QW_ACT_R41.name: Error message describes invalid form field value
QW_ACT_R41.description: This rule checks that text error messages provided when the user completes a form field with invalid values or using an invalid format, identify the cause of the error or how to fix the error.

QW_ACT_R42.name: Object element rendering non-text content has non-empty accessible name
QW_ACT_R42.description: This rule checks that each object element rendering non-text content has a non-empty accessible name.

QW_ACT_R43.name: Scrollable element is keyboard accessible
QW_ACT_R43.description: This rule checks that scrollable elements can be scrolled by keyboard

QW_ACT_R44.name: Links with identical accessible names and same context serve equivalent purpose
QW_ACT_R44.description: This rule checks that links with identical accessible names in the same context resolve to the same or equivalent resources.

QW_ACT_R48.name: Element marked as decorative is not exposed
QW_ACT_R48.description: This rule checks that elements marked as decorative either are not included in the accessibility tree, or have a presentational role.

QW_ACT_R49.name: Audio or video that plays automatically has no audio that lasts more than 3 seconds
QW_ACT_R49.description: audio or video that plays automatically does not output audio for more than 3 seconds.

QW_ACT_R50.name: Audio or video that plays automatically has a control mechanism
QW_ACT_R50.description: audio or video that plays automatically must have a control mechanism.

QW_ACT_R51.name: Video element visual-only content is media alternative for text
QW_ACT_R51.description: This rule checks non-streaming silent video is a media alternative for text on the page.

QW_ACT_R52.name: DEPRECATED — Video element visual-only content has description track
QW_ACT_R52.description: This rule checks that description tracks that come with non-streaming video elements, without audio, are descriptive.

QW_ACT_R53.name: Video element visual-only content has transcript
QW_ACT_R53.description: Non-streaming video elements without audio must have all visual information available in a transcript.

QW_ACT_R54.name: Video element visual-only content has audio track alternative
QW_ACT_R54.description: Non-streaming video elements without audio must have an audio alternative.

QW_ACT_R55.name: Video element visual content has audio description
QW_ACT_R55.description: This rule checks that non-streaming video elements have all visual information also contained in the audio.

QW_ACT_R56.name: Video element content is media alternative for text
QW_ACT_R56.description: This rule checks non-streaming video is a media alternative for text on the page.

QW_ACT_R57.name: DEPRECATED — Video element visual content has description track
QW_ACT_R57.description: This rule checks that description tracks that come with non-streaming video elements are descriptive.

QW_ACT_R58.name: Audio element content has transcript
QW_ACT_R58.description: This rule checks that audio elements have a transcript that includes all auditory information.

QW_ACT_R59.name: Audio element content is media alternative for text
QW_ACT_R59.description: This rule checks that the audio is a media alternative for text on the page.

QW_ACT_R60.name: Video element auditory content has captions
QW_ACT_R60.description: This rule checks that captions are available for audio information in non-streaming video elements.

QW_ACT_R61.name: Audio and visuals of video element have transcript
QW_ACT_R61.description: This rule checks that non-streaming video elements have all audio and visual information available in a transcript.

QW_ACT_R62.name: Element in sequential focus order has visible focus
QW_ACT_R62.description: This rule checks that each element in sequential focus order has some visible focus indication.

QW_ACT_R63.name: Document has a landmark with non-repeated content
QW_ACT_R63.description: This rule checks that each page has an element with a landmark semantic role starting with non-repeated content

QW_ACT_R64.name: Document has heading for non-repeated content
QW_ACT_R64.description: This rule checks that the non-repeated content contains a heading

QW_ACT_R65.name: Element with presentational children has no focusable content
QW_ACT_R65.description: This rule checks that elements with a role that makes its children presentational do not contain focusable elements.

QW_ACT_R66.name: Menuitem has non-empty accessible name
QW_ACT_R66.description: This rule checks that each element with a menuitem role has a non-empty accessible name.

QW_ACT_R67.name: Letter spacing in style attributes is not !important
QW_ACT_R67.description: This rule checks that the style attribute is not used to prevent adjusting letter-spacing by using !important, except if it's at least 0.12 times the font size.

QW_ACT_R68.name: Line height in style attributes is not !important
QW_ACT_R68.description: This rule checks that the style attribute is not used to prevent adjusting line-height by using !important, except if it's at least 1.5 times the font size.

QW_ACT_R69.name: Word spacing in style attributes is not !important
QW_ACT_R69.description: This rule checks that the style attribute is not used to prevent adjusting word-spacing by using !important, except if it's at least 0.16 times the font size.

QW_ACT_R70.name: Iframe with interactive elements is not excluded from tab-order
QW_ACT_R70.description: This rule checks that iframe elements which contain an interactive (tabbable) element are not excluded from sequential focus navigation.

QW_ACT_R71.name: Meta element has no refresh delay (no exception)
QW_ACT_R71.description: This rule checks that the meta element is not used for delayed redirecting or refreshing.

QW_ACT_R72.name: First focusable element is link to non-repeated content
QW_ACT_R72.description: This rule checks that the first focusable element is a link to non-repeated content in the page

QW_ACT_R73.name: Block of repeated content is collapsible
QW_ACT_R73.description: This rule checks that repeated blocks of content are collapsible.

QW_ACT_R74.name: Document has an instrument to move focus to non-repeated content
QW_ACT_R74.description: This rule checks that there is an instrument to move focus to non-repeated content in the page.

QW_ACT_R75.name: Bypass Blocks of Repeated Content
QW_ACT_R75.description: This rule checks that each page has a mechanism to bypass repeated blocks of content.

QW_ACT_R76.name: Text has enhanced contrast
QW_ACT_R76.description: This rule checks that the highest possible contrast of every text character with its background meets the enhanced contrast requirement.
